===
fdf
===


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/fdf.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/fdf

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/Ledenel/fdf.svg

.. image:: https://pyup.io/repos/github/Ledenel/fdf/shield.svg
     :target: https://pyup.io/repos/github/Ledenel/fdf/

File-system based Data Frame: manipulate self-explanatory dataset without writing codes.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://fdf.readthedocs.io.
